Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Happytime Murders' (2018), what is the motive behind the killer targeting the Happytime Gang cast?
Options:
A. To eliminate competition for the show
B. To receive a larger share of the royalty money
C. To take revenge on the cast members
D. To gain fame and recognition
Correct Answer: To eliminate competition for the show, To receive a larger share of the royalty money
